title: DesktopServer
clickWrap:
DesktopServer - A Desktop Web Server Control Panel
Copyright 2019 by ServerPress, LLC

description: Please choose an option below and click the Continue button to proceed.

options.name: New DesktopServer Installation
options.finishMessage: Installation is now complete. You can find DesktopServer in your c:\xampplite folder. Thank you for using ServerPress.com's DesktopServer.
commands: It appears that you have another web server already running on port 80. DesktopServer cannot be installed. Check that you do not have Microsoft Internet Information Server or WAMP running. See 'troubleshooting' in our 'How to Install DeskopServer' guide via serverpress.com/downloads.

It appears that you have another web server already running on port 443. DesktopServer cannot be installed. Check that you do not have Microsoft Internet Information Server or WAMP running. See 'troubleshooting' in our 'How to Install DeskopServer' guide via serverpress.com/downloads.

It appears that you have a MySQL server running. DesktopServer already includes a MySQL server and cannot be installed. Running more than one MySQL server may corrupt data! Please turn off and remove your other server (i.e. MAMP, Bitnami, etc.). See 'troubleshooting' in our 'How to Install DeskopServer' guide via serverpress.com/downloads.
Please wait while files are being copied...
Done! You can start DesktopServer from the C:\xampplite\DesktopServer.exe program icon. Click Finish to close the installer.

options.name: Upgrade DesktopServer
options.finishMessage: DesktopServer upgrade complete. You may now restart DesktopServer. Thank you for using ServerPress.com's DesktopServer.
commands: Please wait while we shut down services.
For compatibility, the new default folder is simply 'Sites' in your user folder. Any old sites in the 'Documents/Websites' folder have been moved to the 'Sites' folder.
Upgrade complete. You can start DesktopServer from the C:\xampplite\DesktopServer.exe program icon. Click Finish to close the installer.

options.name: Uninstall (CAUTION: Deletes Database)
options.finishMessage: DesktopServer has now been removed. Thank you for using ServerPress.com's DesktopServer.
commands: Please wait while we remove services.
Please wait while files are being removed...
Click Finish to close the installer.
